name: Unstoppable (Vinark117)
description:
A train is malfunctioned, and now is out of control! You need to fix the problems as fast as possible. Complete puzzles and other minigames to fix the train.

Controls:

  • Left and right arrow / A and D / mouse scroll wheel to move the camera along the train.
  • Escape to exit to main menu.
  • R to restart the level, or the specific puzzle.
  • In the draw lines minigame press U / Del / Right mouse button to delete the previously drawn line.
  • In the maze minigame you can release the stone to set a checkpoint, if you hit the wall, the stone will be teleported back to that position.

The minigames:

  • There are 5 different kinds of minigames.
  • Each minigame is specific to a part if the train.

Sources:

  • All code was written during the 48 hour time limit.
  • All textures and graphics were made by me during the jam.
  • Sound effects from http://soundbible.com/ and https://freesound.org/
